name: OPAL's Cozy Death Trap
description:
You wake up in a locked room and there's this girl on a screen named Opal who says she's going to kill you. Good thing she's kind of a ditz and misplaced the button to activate whatever is going to kill you. You have 5 minutes to figure out how to get out of there.

-4 Endings

-one of them has a puddle of blood but like, it's not drawn very well

-Dumb jokes

-Unedited grammar and punctuation

-Surprisingly chill

-A demo feverishly made in 24 hours for a game jam whose deadline I missed

(update where you can't get stuck in a couple places, cause i didn't beta test this either it's a hot mess)

(update 2: where I broke the puzzle but I fixed it, also sprite looks marginally better)
